a._0: The city's neon lights flicker ominously as you walk its dark streets. You are Bob, a hitman with a dangerous reputation. Tonight, the city feels colder and crueler.
a._1: Your heart aches as you think of Daisy, your loyal companion, who was brutally taken from you. She was a gift from your late wife, a symbol of the love and peace you once had.
a._2: Now, there is only darkness and the burning desire for revenge. You know who is responsible: Ivan, the son of the ruthless mob boss Vladimir, and his bodyguard, Kevin, the one who killed Daisy.
a._0_player: They will pay for what they've done. This city will run red with their blood.
a._3: You tighten your grip on your weapon and set out to find your targets. The night is young, and your vengeance will be swift.

chc_0.txt: Head to the nightclub where Ivan is known to hang out.

b._0: The nightclub is loud and chaotic, a stark contrast to the silence of your grief. You slip through the crowd, eyes scanning for Ivan.
b._1: Underneath the flashing lights, you spot Kevin, Ivan's bodyguard, standing near the VIP section. He hasn't seen you yet.

_0_npc.name: Kevin
_0_npc.txt: Stay alert. We can't let anyone through.

chc_1.txt: Sneak past Kevin to get to Ivan.

c._0: The back alleys of the city are filled with whispers and secrets. You approach a known informant who owes you a favor.

_0_npc.name: Informant
_0_npc.txt: Bob, I heard about Daisy. I'm sorry. What do you need?

c._0_player: I need to know where Ivan is hiding. And I need to know now.
c._1: The informant nods, understanding the gravity of your request.

_1_npc.name: Informant
_1_npc.txt: He's been laying low at the old warehouse by the docks. Be careful, Bob. They're expecting trouble.

c._2: With the information you need, you prepare to head to the docks. The thought of revenge fuels your every step.

chc_0.txt: Head to the docks to confront Ivan.

chc_1.txt: Take a detour to gather more weapons.

d._0: You push through the crowd, eyes locked on Kevin. As you approach, he finally notices you, his hand moving to his gun.

_1_npc.name: Kevin
_1_npc.txt: Bob! You shouldn't have come here.

d._1_player: You killed Daisy. You're going to pay for that.
d._2: Kevin draws his gun, but you're faster. The nightclub patrons scatter as gunfire erupts. You take cover and return fire.
d._3: In the chaos, you see Ivan trying to escape through a back door. You can't let him get away.

e._0: You blend into the crowd, moving silently towards the VIP section. Kevin is distracted, his eyes scanning the room but not seeing you.
e._1: You slip past him and into the VIP area, where Ivan sits surrounded by his entourage. He looks up, surprised to see you.

_0_npc.name: Ivan
_0_npc.txt: Bob! What are you doing here?

e._1_player: You know exactly why I'm here.

f._0: The docks are eerily quiet, the sound of waves crashing against the pier the only noise. You move stealthily, eyes scanning for any sign of Ivan or his men.
f._1: You spot a group of armed men patrolling the area. They're on high alert, expecting trouble.

chc_1.txt: Create a distraction to draw them away.

g._0: You head to a hidden armory, a place where you once stored weapons and supplies. It's dusty and forgotten, but the weapons are still there.
g._1: You arm yourself with everything you need for a bloody confrontation.

h._0: You burst through the back door, chasing after Ivan. He stumbles, fear in his eyes as he realizes he can't escape.
h._2: You raise your weapon and fire. Ivan's body crumples to the ground, lifeless.
h._end: You feel a grim satisfaction as you stand over Ivan's body. Daisy is avenged, but the darkness inside you remains.

i._0: You turn your attention to Kevin, determined to make him pay for what he did.
i._1: The firefight is intense, but you manage to get the upper hand. Kevin falls, a bullet in his chest.
i._2: With Kevin dealt with, you turn to see Ivan escaping through the back door.

chc_1.txt: Let him go. Focus on escaping.

j._0: Without hesitation, you draw your gun and shoot Ivan. The room erupts in chaos as his men react.
j._1: You fight your way out, the nightclub turning into a warzone. By the time you escape, you're covered in blood, but Ivan is dead.
j._end: Revenge is yours, but the cost is high. The darkness in your heart remains.

k._0: You grab Ivan and hold him at gunpoint. His men hesitate, unsure of what to do.
k._1: Kevin rushes in, gun drawn, but he stops when he sees you have Ivan.

chc_1.txt: Kill Ivan and take on the rest.

l._0: You move silently, taking out the guards one by one. Their bodies fall into the shadows, unnoticed by their comrades.
l._1: With the guards dealt with, you move deeper into the docks, closer to your target.

m._0: You create a distraction, drawing the guards away from their posts. They rush to investigate, leaving Ivan vulnerable.
m._1: You slip past the commotion and make your way to Ivan's hiding spot.

n._0: You head to the docks, armed and ready for the final confrontation. The sound of waves crashing against the pier fills the air.
n._1: You move stealthily, eyes scanning for any sign of Ivan or his men.

chc_1.txt: Create a distraction to draw them away.

o._0: You return to the nightclub, determined to finish what you started. The place is still chaotic, but you move with purpose.
o._1: You spot Kevin near the VIP section, eyes scanning the room.

chc_1.txt: Sneak past Kevin to get to Ivan.

p._0: You decide to let Ivan go, knowing that the chaos will cover your escape.
p._1: You make your way through the nightclub, avoiding the panicked patrons and slipping out into the night.
p._end: You escape the nightclub, but the darkness in your heart remains. Daisy is avenged, but at what cost?

q._0: You hold Ivan at gunpoint and turn to Kevin.
q._1_player: Tell your men to stand down, or he dies.
q._2: The room falls silent as Kevin's men lower their weapons. You have control, for now.

chc_0.txt: Escape with Ivan as a hostage.

chc_1.txt: Kill Ivan and make your escape.

r._0: You decide to end it here and now. You shoot Ivan, the sound of the gun echoing through the room.
r._1: Kevin and his men react, but you're already moving, fighting your way out of the nightclub.
r._end: You escape, covered in blood, but Ivan is dead. Daisy is avenged, but the darkness in your heart remains.

s._0: You hide in the shadows, waiting for the cover of night. When the time is right, you move silently through the city.
s._1: You reach the docks, the sound of waves crashing against the pier filling the air.

chc_1.txt: Create a distraction to draw them away.

t._0: You move deeper into the docks, finding Ivan hiding in an old warehouse.
t._2: You raise your weapon and fire. Ivan's body crumples to the ground, lifeless.
t._end: You feel a grim satisfaction as you stand over Ivan's body. Daisy is avenged, but the darkness inside you remains.

u._0: You set a trap, waiting for Ivan to walk into it. The sound of footsteps echoes as he approaches.
u._2: You spring the trap, taking Ivan down with ruthless efficiency.
u._end: Ivan is dead, and Daisy is avenged. But the darkness in your heart remains.

v._0: You find Ivan hiding in an old warehouse. He looks up, fear in his eyes as he sees you.

w._0: You wait in the shadows, setting up an ambush for Ivan. When he finally arrives, you strike with deadly precision.
w._1: Ivan falls to the ground, his life ending in an instant.
w._end: Ivan is dead, and Daisy is avenged. But the darkness in your heart remains.

x._0: You take Ivan hostage, using him as a shield as you make your escape. The tension is palpable as you move through the nightclub.
x._1: Kevin and his men follow at a distance, not daring to make a move.

y._0: You decide to end it here and now. You shoot Ivan, the sound of the gun echoing through the room.
y._1: Kevin and his men react, but you're already moving, fighting your way out of the nightclub.
y._end: You escape, covered in blood, but Ivan is dead. Daisy is avenged, but the darkness in your heart remains.

z._0: Once you're safe, you release Ivan, pushing him away from you. He stumbles, fear in his eyes.
z._2: You walk away, leaving Ivan to live with his fear. Daisy is avenged, but the darkness in your heart remains.
z._end: You leave the nightclub, the weight of your vengeance heavy on your shoulders. The city feels colder, but Daisy is avenged.
